db:query.db:name: Przedmioty bez kategorii
db:query.db:command: SELECT `id`, `item_id`, `item_name`, `item_quantity` FROM `items` WHERE `id` NOT IN ( SELECT `item_id` FROM `items_categories` )

db:query.db:name: Przedmioty bez właścicieli
db:query.db:command: SELECT `id` AS `item_key`, `item_id`, `item_name` FROM `items` WHERE `id` NOT IN ( SELECT `item_id` FROM `person_items` )

db:query.db:name: Przedmioty niezlikwidowane
db:query.db:command: SELECT `id` AS item_key, `item_id`, `item_name`, `item_quantity` FROM `items` WHERE `id` NOT IN (SELECT `item_id` FROM `liquidation_items`) OR (SELECT `liquidation_active` FROM `liquidation_items` WHERE `item_id`=`items`.`id`) IS NOT TRUE;

db:query.db:name: Przedmioty spoza wybranej grupy
db:query.db:command: SELECT `items`.`id` AS `item_key`, `items`.`item_id`, `items`.`item_name`, `items`.`item_quantity`, `quantity_units`.`quantity_unit_id`, `items`.`item_price`, `items`.`item_value`, `locations`.`location_id`, `persons`.`person_id`, `persons`.`person_surname`, `persons`.`person_givenname`, `items`.`item_date`, `liquidation_items`.`liquidation_active`, `liquidations`.`liquidation_id`, `liquidations`.`liquidation_date`, `items`.`item_comment` FROM `items` LEFT JOIN `quantity_units` ON `items`.`item_quantity_unit` = `quantity_units`.`id` LEFT JOIN `locations` ON `items`.`item_location` = `locations`.`id` LEFT JOIN ( `person_items` CROSS JOIN `persons` ) ON ( `person_items`.`item_id` = `items`.`id` AND `person_items`.`person_id` = `persons`.`id` ) LEFT JOIN ( `liquidation_items` CROSS JOIN `liquidations` ) ON ( `liquidation_items`.`item_id` = `items`.`id` AND `liquidation_items`.`liquidation_id` = `liquidations`.`id` ) WHERE `items`.`id` NOT IN ( SELECT `item_id` FROM `items_groups` LEFT JOIN `groups` ON `items_groups`.`group_id` = `groups`.`id` WHERE `groups`.`group_id` LIKE :GroupIdPattern )

db:query.db:name: Przedmioty wszystkie
db:query.db:command: SELECT `items`.`id` AS item_key, `items`.`item_id`, `items`.`item_name`, `items`.`item_quantity`, `quantity_units`.`quantity_unit_id`, `items`.`item_price`, `items`.`item_value`, `locations`.`location_id`, `persons`.`person_id`, `persons`.`person_surname`, `persons`.`person_givenname`, `items`.`item_date`, `liquidation_items`.`liquidation_active`, `liquidations`.`liquidation_id`, `liquidations`.`liquidation_date`, `items`.`item_comment` FROM `items` LEFT JOIN `quantity_units` ON (`items`.`item_quantity_unit`=`quantity_units`.`id`) LEFT JOIN `locations` ON (`items`.`item_location`=`locations`.`id`) LEFT JOIN (`person_items` CROSS JOIN `persons`) ON (`person_items`.`item_id`=`items`.`id` AND `person_items`.`person_id`=`persons`.`id`) LEFT JOIN (`liquidation_items` CROSS JOIN `liquidations`) ON (`liquidation_items`.`item_id`=`items`.`id` AND `liquidation_items`.`liquidation_id`=`liquidations`.`id`)

db:query.db:name: Przedmioty z kategoriami
db:query.db:command: SELECT `items`.`id` AS item_key, `items`.`item_id`, `items`.`item_name`, `categories`.`id` AS category_key, `categories`.`category_id`, `categories`.`category_name` FROM `items` JOIN (`items_categories`, `categories`) ON (`items`.`id`=`items_categories`.`item_id` AND `items_categories`.`category_id`=`categories`.`id`);

db:query.db:name: Przedmioty z wybranej grupy
db:query.db:command: SELECT `items`.`id` AS `item_key`, `items`.`item_id`, `items`.`item_name`, `items`.`item_quantity`, `quantity_units`.`quantity_unit_id`, `items`.`item_price`, `items`.`item_value`, `groups`.`group_id`, `groups`.`group_name`, `locations`.`location_id`, `persons`.`person_id`, `persons`.`person_surname`, `persons`.`person_givenname`, `items`.`item_date`, `liquidation_items`.`liquidation_active`, `liquidations`.`liquidation_id`, `liquidations`.`liquidation_date`, `items`.`item_comment`, `items_groups`.`item_group_comment` FROM `items` LEFT JOIN `quantity_units` ON `items`.`item_quantity_unit` = `quantity_units`.`id` LEFT JOIN ( `items_groups` CROSS JOIN `groups` ) ON ( `items_groups`.`item_id` = `items`.`id` AND `items_groups`.`group_id` = `groups`.`id` ) LEFT JOIN `locations` ON `items`.`item_location` = `locations`.`id` LEFT JOIN ( `person_items` CROSS JOIN `persons` ) ON ( `person_items`.`item_id` = `items`.`id` AND `person_items`.`person_id` = `persons`.`id` ) LEFT JOIN ( `liquidation_items` CROSS JOIN `liquidations` ) ON ( `liquidation_items`.`item_id` = `items`.`id` AND `liquidation_items`.`liquidation_id` = `liquidations`.`id` ) WHERE ( `groups`.`group_id` LIKE :GroupIdPattern )

db:query.db:name: Przedmioty z wybranej kategorii
db:query.db:command: SELECT `items`.`id` AS `item_key`, `items`.`item_id`, `items`.`item_name`, `items`.`item_quantity`, `quantity_units`.`quantity_unit_id`, `items`.`item_price`, `items`.`item_value`, `categories`.`category_id`, `categories`.`category_name`, `locations`.`location_id`, `persons`.`person_id`, `persons`.`person_surname`, `persons`.`person_givenname`, `items`.`item_date`, `liquidation_items`.`liquidation_active`, `liquidations`.`liquidation_id`, `liquidations`.`liquidation_date`, `items`.`item_comment` FROM `items` LEFT JOIN `quantity_units` ON `items`.`item_quantity_unit` = `quantity_units`.`id` LEFT JOIN ( `items_categories` CROSS JOIN `categories` ) ON ( `items_categories`.`item_id` = `items`.`id` AND `items_categories`.`category_id` = `categories`.`id` ) LEFT JOIN `locations` ON `items`.`item_location` = `locations`.`id` LEFT JOIN ( `person_items` CROSS JOIN `persons` ) ON ( `person_items`.`item_id` = `items`.`id` AND `person_items`.`person_id` = `persons`.`id` ) LEFT JOIN ( `liquidation_items` CROSS JOIN `liquidations` ) ON ( `liquidation_items`.`item_id` = `items`.`id` AND `liquidation_items`.`liquidation_id` = `liquidations`.`id` ) WHERE ( `categories`.`category_id` LIKE :CategoryPattern )

db:query.db:name: Przedmioty z właścicielami
db:query.db:command: SELECT `items`.`id` AS item_key, `items`.`item_id`, `items`.`item_name`, `persons`.`id` AS person_key, `persons`.`person_id`, `persons`.`person_surname`, `persons`.`person_givenname`, `persons`.`person_email` FROM `items` JOIN (`person_items`, `persons`) ON (`items`.`id` = `person_items`.`item_id` AND `person_items`.`person_id` = `persons`.`id`);

db:query.db:name: Przedmioty zlikwidowane
db:query.db:command: SELECT `items`.`id` AS item_key, `items`.`item_id`, `items`.`item_name`, `items`.`item_quantity`, `liquidations`.`id` AS liquidation_key, `liquidations`.`liquidation_id`, `liquidations`.`liquidation_subject`, `liquidations`.`liquidation_date`, `liquidation_items`.`liquidation_quantity`, `liquidation_items`.`item_liquidation_reason` FROM `items` JOIN (`liquidation_items`, `liquidations`) ON (`liquidation_items`.`item_id`=`items`.`id` AND `liquidation_items`.`liquidation_id`=`liquidations`.`id` AND `liquidation_items`.`liquidation_active` IS TRUE);
